name: QS Discover for Masters and MBA in Montreal
content: Register at this link: https://bit.ly/3wXhzKy Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot taken onsite, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today: https://bit.ly/3wXhzKy Time: 3:30 PM - 8:30 PM Venue Details: Hotel Bonaventure Montreal, 900 Rue De la Gauchetiere Ouest, Montreal, Quebec, H5A 1E4, Canada Price: Free: CAD 0.00
